text: For the good of your Kingdom, you broke your accords with the Vikings. Yet many of your nobles still dine at their tables and hunt with their sons, and your decision has upset them greatly.
-3 Loyalty for characters with the Viking Ways trait.
-2 Loyalty for characters with the Dutiful trait.
Your whole life, you have been groomed to one day take the throne. Now that day has come, and the efforts your father put into your political future have paid off.
You've been busy with more important things. Yet in your absense, banditry has spread across the Kingdom, and your neglect has angered some of your more principled nobles.
+1 Loyalty for characters with the Educated trait.
An educated nobility makes our Kingdom stronger. Many of your nobles understand this, and are pleased with your recent investments in building Libraries in your kingdom
